keyMoments.title: Site of the Luffy vs. Usopp Duel
keyMoments.description: Scrap Island serves as the battleground for the fateful duel between Luffy and Usopp over the ownership of the Going Merry.
keyMoments.significance: Becomes the location of one of the most emotionally significant events in One Piece history.

description: An island within Water 7 filled with discarded ship parts and scrap materials. It becomes the agreed-upon location for Luffy and Usopp's duel.

name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

keyMoments.title: Awarded to Usopp After the Duel
keyMoments.description: After defeating Usopp, Luffy tells him he can keep the Going Merry as they will get a new ship.
keyMoments.significance: The ship that brought the crew together becomes a symbol of their separation.

keyMoments.title: The Crew's Final Departure from the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates gather their belongings and leave the Going Merry forever, with most of the crew crying.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the emotional end of the crew's time with their first beloved ship.

keyMoments.title: The Going Merry Appears to Cry
keyMoments.description: Water runs down the Going Merry's hull, giving the impression that the ship itself is crying at being abandoned.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the revelation of the ship's klabautermann (ship spirit).

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted to them by Kaya. After being deemed beyond repair, it becomes the subject of the conflict between Luffy and Usopp.
